REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM V f2497 reute b f BC-new-york-business-loa 04-09 0086

TEXT.TITLE: NEW YORK BUSINESS LOANS FALL 1.31 BILLION DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Commercial and industrial loans on the books of the 10 major New York banks, excluding acceptances, fell 1.31 billion dlrs to 62.70 billion in the week ended April 1, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said. Including acceptances, loans dropped 1.34 billion dlrs to 63.23 billion. Commercial paper outstanding nationally fell 4.80 billion dlrs to 334.28 billion. National business loan data are scheduled to be released on Friday. Reuter
